text: James Stephen Hogg (March 24, 1851March 3, 1906) was an American lawyer and Democratic Party politician who served as governor of Texas from 1891 to 1895.James S. Hogg biography A progressive Democrat, Hogg was notable for presiding over a number of reformsGovernors and the Progressive Movement By David R. Berman, 2019, P.123-126Speeches and state papers of James Stephen Hogg, ex-governor of Texas : with a sketch of his lifeGeneral laws of the State of Texas yr.1892 during his time as governor. ==References== Category:1851 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Texas Category:19th-century American politicians Category:Texas attorneys general
title: Jim Hogg
